original_text: Three times the Romans punished me with sticks. People threw stones at me to kill me once. Three times I have been on ships that broke in the sea. Once I was in the sea for a night and a day.
korean_text: 세 번 태장으로 맞고 한 번 돌로 맞고 세 번 파선하고 일 주야를 깊은 바다에서 지냈으며

sentences.original_text: Three times the Romans punished me with sticks
sentences.korean_translation: 로마 사람들이 나를 막대기로 벌한 것이 세 번이었습니다

sentences.original_text: People threw stones at me to kill me once
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 한 번은 나를 죽이려고 돌을 던졌습니다

sentences.original_text: Three times I have been on ships
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 배를 탄 것이 세 번이었습니다

sentences.original_text: Once I was in the sea
for a night and a day
